sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../../utils/calculateAvgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id ) const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{/* {city} */} {avgRating === 0? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated' ): ( ({reviews?.lenght}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ============= tour review session start========== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{/* ============= tour review session end========== */}
) } export default TourDetails
